item.title: Hugo: The Best Option for Blogging Site
item.description: This article will discuss why the Hugo framework stands out as the top choice for developers seeking to build a blogging sites. Before creating any website, it’s crucial to consider three key questions: Monthly expenses Security Development time so the best option will be the one who score low in monthly expenses and development time while high in security. First, let’s clear up the doubt: “What is Hugo?” if you don’t know or haven’t heard about it yet!
